products.title: Covent Plum Vertical Blind
products.description: The covent plum vertical blind has one of those colours that manages to just work in a whole lot of schemes. Pared back country themes, contemporary bathrooms just to name a few. The covent plum blind has a textured look to it too, light slubs running throughout the fabric. products.title: Cordoba Purple Blackout  Vertical Blind
products.description: Like a royal cloak the cordoba purple vertical blind is a rich and decadent choice. The deep purple colour will make a statement at the window and coordinate beautifully with other purple, amethyst or plum tones.
